Description:
We're seeking a dynamic and dedicated Nursery Manager to lead our vibrant educational community in the heart of the UAE. If you're passionate about early childhood education and have a proven track record of effective leadership, we want to hear from you!Responsibilities:Educational Leadership: Provide visionary leadership to create and implement a high-quality early childhood education program.
Staff Management: Supervise, mentor, and inspire teaching and administrative staff, fostering a culture of excellence and collaboration.
Curriculum Development: Design and oversee a comprehensive and engaging curriculum that aligns with best practices in early childhood education.
Parent Engagement: Build strong relationships with parents, ensuring open communication and collaboration in each child's learning journey.
Enrollment and Admissions: Oversee the enrollment process, manage admissions, and ensure a seamless experience for parents and students.
Budget Management: Manage the nursery's financial resources effectively, ensuring optimal allocation of funds for educational and operational needs.
Regulatory Compliance: Ensure compliance with local and national educational regulations and standards.
Quality Assurance: Implement continuous improvement initiatives to enhance the quality of education and services provided.
Community Outreach: Represent the nursery in the community and establish partnerships to enhance educational offerings.Skills
Skills:
Experience: A minimum of 7 years of progressive leadership experience in an educational setting, with a focus on early childhood education.
Education: Degree in Early Childhood Education, Education Management, or a related field.
Visionary Leadership: Strong leadership skills, with the ability to inspire and guide a team towards educational excellence.
Curriculum Expertise: In-depth knowledge of early childhood education principles, curriculum development, and pedagogical best practices.
Communication: Excellent interpersonal, verbal, and written communication skills.
Problem-Solving: Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities, with a proactive and solution-oriented mindset.
Female
